entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to load DLL 'libgdiplus': The specified module could not be found M1 mac #63135
  • [API Proposal]: Make digest size constants public #63130

Closed

  • Peter Nwode #63134
  • Enumerable.MinBy and Enumerable.MaxBy may or may not throw on empty collections depending on the collection type #62656
  • Unable to get architecture of the current processor #43246
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Delete NativeAOT-specific CoreLib string resources #63129
    area-System.Reflection

Merged

  • Delete unused libs.native shims #63132
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Use System.Runtime.InteropServices.EnableConsumingManagedCodeFromNativeHosting #62903
    linkable-framework, area-Interop-mono

Updated

  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1526583 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Parse compiler version in init-compiler.sh #63126
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono] Make some icalls pass/return object references using ObjectHandleOnStack/QCallTypeHandle #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
